comments.body:
Should we validate `config.URL` is a valid url? 

If we don't, then when will it fail? does it fail when otel stuff is initialized or will it fail when we try to add a trace for something?

I renamed it to Endpoint, since it is technically a GRPC target, and it follows https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/doc/naming.md.  It must be a URI, so I added validation as well.

If the endpoint isn't valid, it will log an error every few minutes when it tries to connect.
